name: Zelda Musou Treasure Box
summary:
The Treasure Box of Zelda Musou includes the following content: 
 
Official Art Book collection 
Tri-Force Table clock 
“Courage” costume set (3 types) 
“Wisdom” costume set (3 types) 
“Power” costume set (2 types) 
Link’s scarf 
Treasure chest accessory case (with sound)

alternative_names.name: ゼルダ無双 トレジャーBOX
